https://tmrev.io/movie/733542-A Song Of Despair 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kp7Aq6orTq8xZa3PbFneR65fgos.jpg The film is about modern, young Asian people arriving in America for school, who grew up in a very traditional society, but have very non-traditional ways of thinking. Despite moving to America, they find it difficult to break free from their traditional way of thinking even with their newfound freedoms. A Song Of Despair
